mapper.select: SELECT s020.slave_id, s020.seq, s020.alarm_max_value, s020.alarm_min_value, s020.alarm_tm, s020.slave_detail_nm, f010.fft_event_tm, f010.elec_sum, f010.elec_leak_sum, f010.sensor_sum, f010.VALUE_1, f010.VALUE_2, f010.VALUE_3, f010.VALUE_4, f010.VALUE_5, f010.VALUE_6, f010.VALUE_7, f010.VALUE_8, f010.VALUE_9, f010.VALUE_10, f010.VALUE_11, f010.VALUE_12, f010.VALUE_13, f010.VALUE_14, f010.VALUE_15, f010.VALUE_16, f010.VALUE_17, f010.VALUE_18, f010.VALUE_19, f010.VALUE_20, f010.VALUE_21, f010.VALUE_22, f010.VALUE_23, f010.VALUE_24, f010.VALUE_25, f010.VALUE_26, f010.VALUE_27, f010.VALUE_28, f010.VALUE_29, f010.VALUE_30, f010.VALUE_31, f010.VALUE_32, f010.VALUE_33, f010.VALUE_34, f010.VALUE_35, f010.VALUE_36, f010.VALUE_37, f010.VALUE_38, f010.VALUE_39, f010.VALUE_40, f010.VALUE_41, f010.VALUE_42, f010.VALUE_43, f010.VALUE_44, f010.VALUE_45, f010.VALUE_46, f010.VALUE_47, f010.VALUE_48, f010.VALUE_49, f010.VALUE_50, f010.VALUE_51, f010.VALUE_52, f010.VALUE_53, f010.VALUE_54, f010.VALUE_55, f010.VALUE_56, f010.VALUE_57, f010.VALUE_58, f010.VALUE_59, f010.VALUE_60, f010.VALUE_61, f010.VALUE_62, f010.VALUE_63, f010.VALUE_64, f010.VALUE_65, f010.VALUE_66, f010.VALUE_67, f010.VALUE_68, f010.VALUE_69, f010.VALUE_70, f010.VALUE_71, f010.VALUE_72, f010.VALUE_73, f010.VALUE_74, f010.VALUE_75, f010.VALUE_76, f010.VALUE_77, f010.VALUE_78, f010.VALUE_79, f010.VALUE_80, f010.VALUE_81, f010.VALUE_82, f010.VALUE_83, f010.VALUE_84, f010.VALUE_85, f010.VALUE_86, f010.VALUE_87, f010.VALUE_88, f010.VALUE_89, f010.VALUE_90, f010.VALUE_91, f010.VALUE_92, f010.VALUE_93, f010.VALUE_94, f010.VALUE_95, f010.VALUE_96, f010.VALUE_97, f010.VALUE_98, f010.VALUE_99, f010.VALUE_100 FROM tb_s050.tb_s050_fft010 f010 inner join tb_s050.tb_s050_slave020 s020 on s020.slave_id = f010.slave_id and s020.seq = f010.seq inner join tb_s050.tb_s050_slave010 s010 on s020.slave_id = s020.slave_id and s010.app_tp = #{appTp} order by fft_event_tm desc limit 1;;
